comment.author: 63191264@N00
comment._content: Born in Willesden, London in 1896, the only son and youngest of three children born to Charles Henry Green [b.1858 Liverpool] and Sarah Eleanor Green nee Booth [b.1865 Padiham, Lancs.]. The 1911 census records him as a school boy living at “Kingsleigh”, Ealing Road, London, with his parents and older sisters Gladys [b.1889 Liverpool] and Lalla [b.1892 Walthamstow, London].
